## BlockDragSurfaceSvg.translateBy() method

Translates the entire surface by a relative offset.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
translateBy(deltaX: number, deltaY: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  deltaX | number | Horizontal offset in pixel units. |
|  deltaY | number | Vertical offset in pixel units. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
